Counter Strkie: Source is a fun game and I do reccomend it. I only have a few things wrong with it, for starters: the bots are way over powered, I shot one in the face with a shotgun and he had almost full health and he shot me once in the foot with a pistle and I died instantly, Players are underpowerded, There is no sprint. I do like the game and have a good time playing. I do recommend buying this game.

Продолжение культовой серии, которое закрепило за собой статус нового культового мультиплеерного шутера, который долгое время пользовался и пользуется популярностью, даже после выхода GO.

+ Une refonte de la référence en matière de FPS multijoueur
+Balancement des armes extrêmement réussi
+ Bonne communauté
+ Rapide et addictif
+ Nombreux mods et serveur pour débutant
- Courbe d'apprentissage très élevé à réservée à ceux qui ont un sens poussé de l'observation, de la réflextion et de la patience
- Nécessite quelque recherche sur le web pour s'initier
- Peu de nouveautées aparentes

To some, CS:S is better than sex. Probably to the same people who's juvenile and immature stereotypical tea-bagging snotty boastful gamers who use their "1337 supahr skilz to pwn te n00bs" (see: Halo)
This is a good game, the basic "shoot anything that's shooting you" that bings me memories of nostalgia from Golden Eye (but thats probably just me), the community, being split into the mentally unstable mic-screamers hogging sniper rifles or try-hard clan-wads, the only time I could play normally without downloading a random mod is with bots.
And they wear out fast.
In conclusion: I'm totally indifferent about Counter Strike: Source. Few hours raked in, not enough to say whether to buy the f*ck out of it or avoid it like it's carrying a mutated strain of the bubonic plague that somehow survived in the fossilized rat-scat found in an english gutter.
